employees.name: Danielle Vogel
employees.title: Director of Operations
employees.desc: Opening DK Web Design was a life long desire in the making. It has allowed me to not only do what I love on a daily basis but also support causes that I deeply care about. My passion is helping people and this business allows me to do just that. Outside of work I enjoy spending down time with my husband and our two dogs, traveling, and trying as many new foods as possible!
specialites: A.A. in Graphic Design for Print
B.S. in Web Design and Interactive Media
Stops to say hi to every dog she sees
Favorite Shows: Walking Dead, Game of Thrones

employees.name: Kelly Comer
employees.title: Website Consultant
employees.desc: My desire to learn is insatiable. I love talking with people and learning their story; I find it very inspiring!

employees.name: Bree Sears
employees.title: Web Developer
employees.desc: I have always had an interest in computers, and that interest led me to completing a degree in Computer Information Systems from Chico State University. I find web design and development to be a main area of interest for me and feel very fortunate to be employed at such a great company where I can explore my passion fully. When I'm not building websites I enjoy spending time with my wonderful family, fire dancing, and playing the cello in my spare time.

employees.name: Juan Villalobos
employees.title: Web Developer
employees.desc: Golfer, Developer, GoPro enthusiast, and big dreamer. I live every day with a big smile on my face, and I find joy in creating minimalist, unique, easy-to-use websites. My aim is to create an experience that will engage, delight, and inspire users, leaving a lasting impression on your customers and clients.

employees.name: Jaskarn Jagpal
employees.title: Programmer
employees.desc: I have been interested in computers and programming since my first encounter with a computer however I started college as a biology major and I hated every minute of it. I then realized that working on and with computers was what I really wanted to pursue. Some of my hobbies include: running, playing basketball, modding and upgrading computers, programming, and watching The Walking Dead every Sunday with friends.
specialites: Skilled in Python, Java, PHP, C, and C++

employees.name: Heather Elizabeth
employees.title: Writer/Editor
employees.desc: The ability to effectively communicate, inform, or persuade is a powerful tool.  I love manipulating language or changing sentence structure to appeal to a specific audience-- it's like building a puzzle from words.  Other interests include piano, gardening, hiking, rock climbing, eating, spending time with my loved ones, learning, and being an awesome auntie to some super cute dogs.
